import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import Link from 'react-router-dom' const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name : '', email : '', password: '', password2: '' }); const {name, email, password,password2} = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); return (
Sign Up
onChange(e)} placeholder = "Name" required />
onChange(e)} required />
onChange(e)} required/>
Do not have an account? Sign up
) } export default Login;
